introduction: Embark on a musical journey like no other with Cyber Surfer: Beat&Skateboard app! As a cyberpunk knight, this game lets you surf through different music genres while riding a skateboard and wielding a lightsaber. From Pop to Rap, EDM to Rock, and JPOP to KPOP, you can immerse yourself in the hits of artists from all walks of music like Imagine Dragons, Justin Bieber, LiSA, BLACKPINK & BTS.  Not only that, you can also skate and slice to your own tunes saved on your phone! Designed with a cool ‘Cyberpunk’ style, Cyber Surfer delivers a smashing music game experience that's bound to keep you captivated.
app_summary: Follow the music to slide the skateboard & wield the lightsaber

introduction: Dive into the realm of absurdity and hilarity with Troll Face Quest: Horror 3, the latest installment of the highly praised puzzle game series! Delve into the mind-boggling point-and-click puzzles imbued with a bizarre blend of horror and comedy. Gird yourself for the creepiest yet tickling adventures that await in this jaw-dropping journey of insanity. There's only one right answer within the labyrinth of laugh-out-loud quests, and you’ll have to brave the odds to unearth it!
app_summary: Get ready to dive deep into the shadows of Troll Face Quest insanity!
